name: Aliens
description: Aliens is a turn based combat game inspired by the movie with the same name. You take control of the eight marines and have to get them to the exit. The game consists of three levels and at level one you must get at least four to the exit and at level two and three two men. Aliens will appear continuously until you finish the level. Your marines are armed with either pistol, machine-gun, shotgun or flamethrower. How much damage they do and how far they reach depends on if you let them aim the weapons before firing; for example a pistol does 2 damage at range one unaimed and 6 damage aimed. On level two and three you may also use grenades. When an alien is hit by anything, except the flamethrower, there will be an acid splash which may hurt nearby marines.
